channel.title: Pures venging at 1def wdf?
channel.description: Yeah, i tried everything like the ID of the Spell to the ID of the altar and make it deny acess, but didnt work all i got was "you need 40def to vengace" then it goes and veng its like the messgae just comes up and doen't Do anything, well i just about had enough.

item.title: Pures venging at 1def wdf?
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

I forgot to add a part…

primadude has kindly pointed that out.

Read full topic

item.title: Pures venging at 1def wdf?
item.dc:creator: @burnt_w_pwnt burnt w pwnt
item.description:
@burnt_w_pwnt wrote:

[quote=“krazy karl, post:3, topic:292543”]You should do something like make it so they need Defence, like this…

else if(playerLevel[1] < 40) { sM("You need 40 Defence to use Vengance!");
Add that into your vengance code, and add something that stops the spell being cast, this can be found in your server files, if you try cast say, ice barrage, without 94 magic, look for the message it sends you, then just change the
[6] to [1] and then change the 94 to whatever Defence level you want it to be, then you should be fine.[/quote]
I tried that, but it says that but doesnt do anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Pures venging at 1def wdf?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“krazy karl, post:3, topic:292543”]You should do something like make it so they need Defence, like this…

else if(playerLevel[1] < 40) { sM("You need 40 Defence to use Vengance!");
Add that into your vengance code, and add something that stops the spell being cast, this can be found in your server files, if you try cast say, ice barrage, without 94 magic, look for the message it sends you, then just change the
[6] to [1] and then change the 94 to whatever Defence level you want it to be, then you should be fine.[/quote]

Something along the lines of:

if (playerLevel[1] < 40 ) { sendMessage("You must have a defence level of 40 to use this spell!"); return; }

Would be better; conventions and it ends the method if the if statement is true.

Read full topic

You should do something like make it so they need Defence, like this…

else if(playerLevel[1] < 40) { sM("You need 40 Defence to use Vengance!");
Add that into your vengance code, and add something that stops the spell being cast, this can be found in your server files, if you try cast say, ice barrage, without 94 magic, look for the message it sends you, then just change the
[6] to [1] and then change the 94 to whatever Defence level you want it to be, then you should be fine.
